analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x67e35c00181d10c2b3f45d1bd937193e124ea07f.sol:
	Contract Cryptochats has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x67e35c00181d10c2b3f45d1bd937193e124ea07f.sol#213)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x67e35c00181d10c2b3f45d1bd937193e124ea07f.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
